mitid_credentials.title: e-Boks - MitID Login
mitid_credentials.description:
Click the button below to log in with MitID.

After login, the browser will show an error (cannot open eboksdk://). Copy the entire URL and paste it on the page that opens.

mitid_manual.title: e-Boks - MitID Token (Manual)
mitid_manual.description:
Enter your e-Boks refresh token manually.

To get a token, run: python3 tools/get_eboks_token.py

Or see the guide: https://github.com/Hovborg/ha-eboks#getting-refresh-token

data_description.refresh_token: e-Boks refresh token from MitID login
